description: NOTICE OF PROPOSED PROCUREMENT (NPP) For Task–Based Informatics Professional Service: Requirements for services (TBIPS) GSIN: D302A – Informatics Professional services...)
duration_in_months: With the contract commencing immediately upon contract award, the expected contract date is November 2, 2022
full_summary:
# 9F032-22-0053  - Livelink Consultant Services

**Government of Canada Tender Notice**
-----------------------------

### Contract Details

* **Contract Title**: Livelink Consultant Services
* **Solicitation Number**: 9F032-22-0053
* **Reference Number**: 9F032
* **Contracting Entity**: Canadian Space Agency (CSA)
* **Location**: Quebec (except NCR)

### Tender Overview

The Canadian Space Agency (CSA) is seeking a Livelink Consultant Services provider to support its operations. The contract will be awarded through a competitive bidding process.

### Contract Requirements

* GSIN: D302A - Informatics Professional Services
* Contract Duration: From one year after the contract award date
* Estimated Level of Effort: To be indicated in the Statement of Work (SOW)
* Trade Agreements: The requirement is subject to the provisions of the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Comprehensive Land Claim Agreement: Not applicable

### Tender Documents

The tender documents can be accessed through the Canada Buys website at the following links:

* Amendment 1: [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/11/11/a405a504e60ae96deaa7b01a09f81673/9f032-22-0053_-_livelink_consultant_services_-_amendment_1-_npp.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/11/11/a405a504e60ae96deaa7b01a09f81673/9f032-22-0053_-_livelink_consultant_services_-_amendment_1-_npp.pdf)
* Amendment 2: [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/12/06/d745b1e1cae4add82686ab55c2a9dabd/9f032-22-0053_-_livelink_consultant_services_-_amendment_2-_npp.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/12/06/d745b1e1cae4add82686ab55c2a9dabd/9f032-22-0053_-_livelink_consultant_services_-_amendment_2-_npp.pdf)
* Notice of Proposed
